task.title: Draw a line and arc combination polyline
task.shortdesc: Polylines consist of multiple lines and arcs. When drawing a polyline, use the endpoint of the previous line segment as the start point of next arc segment. You can specify angle, center, direction, and radius of the circle for drawing arcs, and specify a center point and an endpoint as well.

context.p: To draw a line segment followed by an arc polyline segment

step.cmd: Choose Draw > Polyline from the mainmenu.
At the command prompt, choose Arc.
Specify the endpoint of the arc segment.
To complete the command, Press ENTER.

result.p: You can edit entire polylines and individual segments using the Edit Polyline tool on the Modify II toolbar. You can convert polylines into arc and line entities using the Explode tool on the Modify toolbar.
